Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="Command"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Function" Type="System.String" Value="Account.UpdateMsisdn"/> <Attribute Name="Msisdn" Type="System.String" Value="##msisdn##"/> <Attribute Name="PersonalAccountNumber" Type="System.Int64" Value="##PersonalAccountNumber##"/> <Attribute Name="TerminalDeviceId" Type="System.Int64" Value="##TerminalDeviceID##"/> <Attribute Name="IsUpdatePA" Type="System.Char" Value="Y"/> </Attributes> </DataSet>
